mapper.select: SELECT w_code, SUBSTR(sa_code,0,INSTR(sa_code,'/')-1)sa_c, SUBSTR(work_start_time,INSTR(work_start_time,' ')+1) sa_start, SUBSTR(work_start_time,0,8) sa_date, SUBSTR(work_end_time,INSTR(work_end_time,' ')+1) sa_end, TRUNC(WORKING_HOURS/60) WORKING_HOURS FROM work_record WHERE SUBSTR(sa_code,0,INSTR(sa_code,'/')-1)=#{id}

SELECT w_code, SUBSTR(w.sa_code,0,INSTR(w.sa_code,'/')-1)sa_c, SUBSTR(work_start_time,INSTR(work_start_time,' ')+1) sa_start, SUBSTR(work_start_time,0,8) sa_date, SUBSTR(work_end_time,INSTR(work_end_time,' ')+1) sa_end, w.sa_code FROM work_record w, salary s WHERE w.sa_code = s.sa_code AND SUBSTR(w.sa_code,0,INSTR(w.sa_code,'/')-1)=#{id} AND SUBSTR(em_code,0,INSTR(em_code,'/')-1)=#{cid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work_record(w_code, sa_code, work_start_time, work_end_time, working_hours) VALUES (#{w_code}, #{sa_code}, #{work_start_time}, #{work_end_time}, #{working_hours})
INSERT INTO work_record(w_code, sa_code, work_start_time) VALUES (#{w_code}, #{sa_code}, #{work_start_time})
mapper.update: UPDATE work_record SET work_end_time = #{work_end_time}, working_hours = (#{work_end_time}-work_start_time) WHERE w_code = #{w_code}
mapper.select: select rownum rn, c.work_place_name work_place_name, s.sa_code sa_code from contract c,employee e,salary s where c.p_id = #{p_id} AND c.c_code = e.c_code AND e.em_code =s.em_code AND rownum = 1 ORDER BY REPLACE(SUBSTR(s.sa_code,INSTR(s.sa_code,'/')+1),'/','')
select SUBSTR(w_code,INSTR(w_code,'/')+1,INSTR(w_code,'/')-1) as w_code,sa_c, sa_start, sa_end, working_hours, work_place_name from workrecord_view v where v.sa_c=#{id} order by w_code asc

select SUBSTR(w_code,INSTR(w_code,'/')+1,INSTR(w_code,'/')-1) as w_code,sa_c, sa_start, sa_end, working_hours, work_place_name from workrecord_view v where v.sa_c=#{p_id} AND v.work_place_name = (select m.work_place_name from member m where m.id=#{id}) order by w_code asc
